org.mini2Dx.ecs.entity

Interface EntityListener


  • public interface EntityListener
    Allows classes to listen for component addition and removal within Entity instances
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void componentAdded(Entity source, Component component)
      Called when a Component is added to an Entity
      void componentRemoved(Entity source, Component component)
      Called when a Component is removed from an Entity

    • Method Detail

      • componentAdded

        void componentAdded(Entity source,
                  Component component)
        Called when a Component is added to an Entity
        Parameters:
        source - The Entity the Component was added to
        component - The Component that was added

      • componentRemoved

        void componentRemoved(Entity source,
                    Component component)
        Called when a Component is removed from an Entity
        Parameters:
        source - The Entity the Component was removed from
        component - The Component that was removed
